return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);

Price: $39.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:04:06 UTC – Details)


Control your lights and appliances with a simple tap or by asking Siri. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories. Eve Energy lets you keep watch the energy your accessories are consuming and shows you how much they’re going to cost based on your entered electricity rate. Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Equipped with Apple HomeKit technology and UL certification, Eve Energy offers outstanding ease of use and advanced security. Eve Energy is quick & easy to set up, and you don’t need a bridge. And the best thing about all Eve accessories is how they protect your privacy: Eve does not harvest your personal data and there is no Eve cloud, so your data won’t get exposed. Local intelligence means all the processing is done locally and Eve accessories communicate directly with your iPhone, iPad, or home hub without any cloud dependency or bridge.
Eve Energy requires iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS
Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button; Effortlessly set up schedules to automatically switch devices – independently of your iPhone and home network
Control your appliances on the go or based on presence via a home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV)
Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
Joins your Thread network automatically (supports Bluetooth and Thread), and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home; HomeKit-enabled for unparalleled ease of use and advanced security; get up and running in a flash with quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway; UL-certified
100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

The Smart Plug & Power Meter is Thread-enabled.


Easy ways to make your home smart.

Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories.

Good to know:

  • Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
  • Quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway / UL-certified
  • Joins your Thread network automatically, and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home / supports Bluetooth and Thread
  • Apple HomeKit-enabled for outstanding ease of use and advanced security
  • 100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

Requirements: iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS; Controlling this HomeKit-enabled accessory automatically and away from home requires a HomePod or an Apple TV (4th generation or later) as a home hub

Power: Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W

Compatibility: Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances

Wireless Connection: Bluetooth, Thread

Dimensions: 2.8 x 1.5 x 2.4 in


Talk or tap to control your home.

Already made yourself comfortable? Hands tied? Turn your devices on and off with a simple tap or by asking Siri. You can also control Eve Energy directly via the built-in switch, which you can protect against curious fingers by activating the child lock.

Control your connected devices from anywhere – whether you’re strolling around the block or exploring the world. Your home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV) will keep you connected to your abode.




Put your appliances on autopilot.

Schedules enable you to automate lights, humidifiers, fans and other vital devices. You can then get on with your business while your accessories get on with theirs – all without the need for a home hub and independently of your iPhone or internet connection.

You could have a floor lamp turn on at sunset even if you’re not at home – that’s not only convenient, but also reassuring.

Automations and HomeKit scenes.

Automations seamlessly connect your HomeKit-enabled accessories. Have a light turn on as soon as the Eve Motion wireless motion sensor detects any movement. Or switch your appliances on and off based on whether someone is leaving or arriving home – and save precious power. As soon as the last person leaves home, all the lights and appliances will turn off automatically.

Combine multiple HomeKit-enabled accessories in a single scene and save yourself the hassle of running to and fro. A “Good Night” scene can turn on your bedside lamps, shut your shades and switch off all the other lights in your home with a single voice command.

Watch those Watts.

Curiosity. Costs. Conservation – reasons to monitor your power consumption and projected cost are aplenty. Eve Energy gives you the insight to embrace yours – and gain a complete overview by entering your electricity rate.

Read more


Robust smart home, with a big future ahead.

Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Thread is also a pillar of Matter – the smart home standard of the future.

Eve Energy Eve Light Switch Eve Motion Eve Room Eve Door & Window Eve Aqua
Description Smart Plug & Power Meter Connected Wall Switch Wireless Motion Sensor Indoor Air Quality Monitor Wireless Contact Sensor Smart Water Controller
Features Built-in schedules, power meter, onboard power button Capacitive touch panel, status LED, Single-pole & 3-way Indoor/outdoor, infrared sensor with 120º field of view, 30 ft max range, 2-second reaction time, IPX3 water resistance Precision VOC, temperature & humidity sensors, e-ink display, built-in rechargeable battery, aluminum frame Discreet design, included mounting spacers Built-in schedules, auto shut-off, onboard control button, aluminum frame, IPX4 water resistance, UV protection, child lock
Direct Connection (No Bridge Necessary) Switch on/off a lamp, fan, etc. via app or Siri, set schedules Make regular hardwired lights smart, switch on/off via app, Siri or direct touch Trigger HomeKit-enabled accessories & scenes via presence (Apple home hub recommended) View indoor air quality & comfort levels, record measurements Check the open/closed status of a door or window, record activity Control a sprinkler via app or Siri, set schedules, track estimated water usage
With Home Hub (Apple TV or HomePod) Control while away from home, automate Control while away from home, automate Get motion detection notifications while away from home, trigger automations View measurements while away from home, trigger automations Get activity notifications while away from home, trigger automations Water garden while away from home, automate
Works great in scenes & automations with: Eve Motion, Eve Door & Window, Eve Room, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare, Eve Light Switch Eve Energy, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare Eve Energy, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare, Eve Light Switch Eve Energy Eve Energy Eve Weather
Specifications Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances Input: AC 120 V, 50/60 Hz; requires a neutral wire; replaces a single-pole or 3-way switch; only for use with copper / copper clad wire in dry, indoor locations 2 seconds reaction time, field of view: 120, distance: 30 ft. max at 6.5 ft. mounting height, 0°F – 130°F), IPX3 water resistance Operating Range: 32°F – 122°F, 5% – 95% humidity, Accuracy: Typical ± 0.54°F Typical ± 3% humidity, Display: E-ink ~ 200 x 200 pixels Easy DIY installation, Self-adhesive, completely wireless, long lasting battery Thread: ¾ in; Operating Range: Pressure: Min 1 bar / 14.5 psi – Max 5 bar / 72.5 psi, Water Resistance, UV Protection
Power Source Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W Min. 3 W; Max. 1800 W / 15 A (resistive); Max. 600 W / 5 A (incandescent / tungsten) 2x AA Replaceable Batteries Built-in micro USB-rechargeable battery: 6+ weeks 1x ER14250 Replaceable Battery 2x AA Replaceable Batteries
Wireless Connection Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine Leak Detector, VXSCAN EVAP Vacuum Leakage Tester, Fuel Pipe Diagnostic Tester with Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge for All 12V Vehicles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand About VXSCAN Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our high-quality products.

VXSCAN’s Value

VXSCAN has the most comprehensive product portfolio, dedicated staff and dedicated technical team to help you with all your vehicle needs and projects.

VXSCAN’s Vision

We share the same passion for vehicles as you do. Our focus is to provide you with the ultimate experience through exceptional service.

VXSCAN’s Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.67 x 9.88 x 6.85 inches; 5.2 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ VXSCAN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B1QGP86W

【EVAP SMOKE MACHINE】VXSCAN V3 is a professional vacuum machine for car fuel pipe system leak detection. Supports EVAP system test, tightness test, intake system test, exhaust system test and various pipe fittings test. V3 smoke leak detector will help you solve the problem, saving time and money.
【EASY TO USE】By heating USP mineral oil or baby oil, the automotive smoke machine can be outputs lots of smoke within 30 seconds, to improve diagnosis efficiency. This evap smoke machine built-in air pump, you don’t need to purchase extra. V3 help you control the smoke effect easily and allowing you to estimate the size of the leak by the change of the gauge value.
【SMOKE FLOW METER & PRESSURE GAUGE】Equipped with pressure gauge and adjustable flow meter which helps you control the smoke effect easily. When the pressure gauge runs to the maximum, the flow meter drops to 0, indicating that your pipeline is not leaking. On the contrary, it means there is smoke leakage.
【Air Mode & Smoke Mode】The V3 smoke leak tester adopts an independent switch control design, the air mode independently controls the built-in air pump, the smoke mode independently controls the smoke generator. With intelligent protection, if the working limit is exceeded, the power will be automatically turned off to ensure the safety of the operator and equipment.
【WIDELY COMPATIBILITY】Our package includes all accessories (Oil not included), it supports detect the leaks of multi pipe systems on cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, off-road vehicles, ATVs, light trucks and speedboats boats. The fuel pipeline leak diagnostic machine is suitable for all brands and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 Automotive Smoke Machine is a universal and professional auto pipe leak detect tool, it will help us position cars motorcycles leakage on the pipe systems quickly and exactly.

VXSCAN V3 TESTER SUPPORTS:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

V3 evap smoke machine can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

2 MODE CONTROL:

  • Smoke Control: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal.
  • Air Control: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE.

Read more

What’s In the Box

  • 1pcs * Car Smoke Leak Detector
  • 1pcs * Hook (with hand-tighten nuts)
  • 1pcs * Universal Intake Bladder
  • 1pcs * Intake Bladder Replacement Rubber
  • 1pcs * Smoke Hose
  • 1pcs * Power Cord
  • 1pcs * Funnel & Oil Bottle (No oil includ)
  • 1pcs * User Manual

Notice before Leak Test

  • Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle
  • Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.
  • Only support a 12V battery with a current range of 8-10A. (Ordinary car batteries are eligible)
Specification

  • Output Pressure: 7-12 PSI
  • Output Flow: <6 L/Min
  • Power Supply: 12V automobile Battery 6Amp
  • Air Pressure Output: Built-in air pump
  • Test Oil Capacity: 10-20ml
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

Read more

How to

  • Fill 10-20ml baby oil to the evap smoke machine for the first time (Do not inject too much at once).
  • Open the engine cover, and hang the detector in the cover.

Use

  • Disconnect the pipes that need to be connected with the smoke leak detector.
  • Insert universal Adapter Cone or other accessories and test pipe.

Leak

  • Connect your car leak test machine power cord to the 12V vehicle battery (red clip to battery positive, black clip to ground, then the power LED will light up, otherwise you need to check the power)
  • Inset the Smoke delivery hose to ddapter cone.

Tester

  • Press Air Control Switch, wait for seconds until the system is pressurized, check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status. Turn on the smoke generator, adjust the smoke amount to suitable amount so you can locate the leak position quickly.
  • The leak can be judged according to where the smoke appears.

Read more

Pressure Gauge

Displays the output pressure of the machine or show the real time pressure of the system been testing.

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Air Flow Meter

Provide a quick visual indication of the amount of air/smoke passing through the system being tested.

Check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status, V3 evap smoke machine can help you find and fix leak problems quickly!

Overload Protection

VXSCAN V3 automotive smoke machine leak detector has built in self-protective system: Overheat and Anti-frost Protection. When the temperature of the device exceeds 120℃, power protection will be intelligently activated to turn it off. The device can also work normally at -20℃. You don’t have to worry about switching on and off the machine constantly during diagnosis. The system takes care of the load for you.

Read more

4.5
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99 - $29.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:44:43 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Mileseey 165 Feet Laser Measure

Better Quality and Unceasing Innovation

Mileseey was established in 1998. With over 20 years of manufacturing and R & D experience in the measuring instruments industry, he works on technological innovation, product usability improvements, and the creation of more economical and stable solutions.

Mileseey is Dedicated to Providing You with the Highest Quality Products and Satisfied After-Sales Service.

Higher Accuracy, Higher Efficiency

Two bubble levels provide more precise measurement compared to one bubble; Measuring range up to 165 Ft, remarkable accuracy reach ±1/16 inch; Fast measurement speed improve your work efficieny greatly.

Product Specifications Measuring range: 165ft / 50m Distance measurement precision: ±1/16 inch(±2mm) Units: m/feet/inches Display: 2.0 inche Large LCD Backlit Laser Level/Type: Class II/635nm, <1mW Max storage: 20 units Battery type: 1.5V 2*AAA(Included) Auto laser power-off: 20s / Auto power-off: 150s

Measure Everywhere

Measured directly, by using the pythagorean theorem (a2+b2=c2).

Area Measurement.

S2 can calculate the area of a square or rectangular room or space by measuring its length and width and multiplying the two values.

Quick measurement in 0.5s

There are two photosensitive holes and a large optical lens. During the measurement process, the light transmittance is increased by 50%, and the response time is 0.5s. It can better withstand strong light interference and can still be clearly read under external sunlight Compared with other laser measurement, it provides more stable and accurate measurement.

Conversion of 4 Units

Press and hold the Units button for 2 seconds to freely change the units to M / In / Ft / Ft + in, which can meet your different measurement needs.

Quick and Accurate Measure to Easy Your Life Perfectly

Compact Size with Multiple Functions – Continuous & Pythagoras & Single Distance Measurement.

Based on measured Length, width and height, gets you smart volume and area calculations, no need of manual operation any more.

Waterproof & Dust-proof to Protect tool

Features IP54 waterproof level, can protect the laser distance measure normally to the maximum extent, which offers a variety of environmental work for using.

Small Body fits in hand perfectly, gives you convenient operation; You can put it in your pocket or carry it everywhere.

Warm Tips 1:It is recommended that you avoid direct sunlight. 2:As strong sunlight weakens the laser energy and can affect accuracy and measurement range, measurement is not recommended for outdoor use. 3:This equipment is a class 2 laser product. Be careful not to touch the user’s eyes. 4:If the sun’s diffuse reflection is weak, use a highly reflective tool.

✓

★ HIGH ACCURACY & UNIT SWITCHABLE ★ With unique 2 Bubble Levels, providing more precise measurement compared to one bubble;With laser precision technology, accuracy ups to ±1/16inch, measuring distance extends to 165 feet; Switchable among M/In/Ft for free adjustment
★ LCD BACKLIGHT & MUTE SETTING ★ Large backlight screen provides you with a better visibility in dark areas; Mute setting allows you turn on or off the measure beep at your will, suitable for using in library, classroom and other quite places,the laser level is ideal for home, construction and industries, especially in large areas such as rooms, apartments, buildings, real estates, factories, warehouses, etc
★ MULTIPLE MEASUREMENT FEATURES ★ Area, distance, length, volume, continuous measurement, Pythagorean method-three points; Addition and subtraction; Low battery indication; 20 groups data memory; Manually delete data; Auto shut down after 150s without any operation to save power
★ DURABLE AND HANDY DESIGN ★ IP54 waterproof level and dust-proof function protect the laser distance measure to the maximum extent; Portable size and hard rubber body provide a good grip; Wrist strap lets you hold the meter steady and carry easily
★ WHAT YOU GET ★ Mileseey Laser Measuring Device 165Ft; 1.5V AAA Batteries; User Manual; Hand Strap; Package Box; 12 Months Warranty(Ideal thanksgiving gifts and christmas gifts for family and friends)

Mileseey 165 Feet Laser Measure

Better Quality and Unceasing Innovation

Mileseey was established in 1998. With over 20 years of manufacturing and R & D experience in the measuring instruments industry, he works on technological innovation, product usability improvements, and the creation of more economical and stable solutions.

Mileseey is Dedicated to Providing You with the Highest Quality Products and Satisfied After-Sales Service.

Higher Accuracy, Higher Efficiency

Two bubble levels provide more precise measurement compared to one bubble; Measuring range up to 165 Ft, remarkable accuracy reach ±1/16 inch; Fast measurement speed improve your work efficieny greatly.

Product Specifications

  • Measuring range: 165ft / 50m
  • Distance measurement precision: ±1/16 inch(±2mm)
  • Units: m/feet/inches
  • Display: 2.0 inche Large LCD Backlit
  • Laser Level/Type: Class II/635nm, <1mW
  • Max storage: 20 units
  • Battery type: 1.5V 2*AAA(Included)
  • Auto laser power-off: 20s / Auto power-off: 150s

Read more

Measure Everywhere

Measured directly, by using the pythagorean theorem (a2+b2=c2).

Area Measurement.

S2 can calculate the area of a square or rectangular room or space by measuring its length and width and multiplying the two values.

Quick measurement in 0.5s

There are two photosensitive holes and a large optical lens. During the measurement process, the light transmittance is increased by 50%, and the response time is 0.5s. It can better withstand strong light interference and can still be clearly read under external sunlight Compared with other laser measurement, it provides more stable and accurate measurement.

Conversion of 4 Units

Press and hold the Units button for 2 seconds to freely change the units to M / In / Ft / Ft + in, which can meet your different measurement needs.

Read more

Quick and Accurate Measure to Easy Your Life Perfectly

Compact Size with Multiple Functions – Continuous & Pythagoras & Single Distance Measurement.

Based on measured Length, width and height, gets you smart volume and area calculations, no need of manual operation any more.

Waterproof & Dust-proof to Protect tool

Features IP54 waterproof level, can protect the laser distance measure normally to the maximum extent, which offers a variety of environmental work for using.

Small Body fits in hand perfectly, gives you convenient operation; You can put it in your pocket or carry it everywhere.

Warm Tips

  • 1:It is recommended that you avoid direct sunlight.
  • 2:As strong sunlight weakens the laser energy and can affect accuracy and measurement range,
  • measurement is not recommended for outdoor use.
  • 3:This equipment is a class 2 laser product. Be careful not to touch the user’s eyes.
  • 4:If the sun’s diffuse reflection is weak, use a highly reflective tool.

Read more

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $77.49 - $62.72
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:29:24 UTC – Details)


The CL120VP Electrical Test Kit from Klein Tools is designed with optimum reliability and safety in mind. Kit comes with 1 meter and 3 testers for a variety of applications and all stored within a convenient padded pouch. The CL120 is an AC auto-ranging 400 Amp AC/DC digital clamp meter. The RT210 Receptacle Tester detects common wiring problems for Standard and GFCI AC electrical outlets. The NCVT-3P is a dual range non-contact tester with flashlight for a broad variety of voltage applications from 12 to 1000V AC or 70 to 1000V AC. Test AC and DC voltage at four commonly used ranges with the ET40 Voltage Tester.
CL120 Clamp Meter measure AC current via the clamp, and AC/DC voltage, resistance and continuity via test leads
Meter has backlit LCD for ease of viewing in low light and is CAT III 600V, Class 2 Double Insulated
RT210 detects the most common wiring problems in standard and GFCI receptacles
A convenient chart on RT210 helps determine wiring conditions open ground, reverse polarity, open hot, open neutral, and hot/ground reversed
NCVT-3P has dual-range capabilities to detect from 12 to 1000V AC or 70 to 1000V AC for a broad variety of low-voltage or standard voltage applications
Bright flashlight illuminates work area and may be used independent of NCVT-3P voltage detection function
ET40 tests AC voltages from 12V to 240V AC at four useful levels aligned with commonly used residential voltages

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Electrical Tester / Auto-Ranging Digital Clamp Meter Kit, GFCI Tester, Line Splitter, Pouch, Leads, 3 x AAA

Klein Tools Clamp Meter Electrical Test Kit includes the CL120 400A Auto-Ranging Digital Clamp Meter, RT210 GFCI Receptacle Tester and 69409 Line Splitter 10x. The Electrical Test Kit allows for easy testing of live circuits and measuring of current and voltage. Included is a carrying pouch, test leads and batteries.

  • Measure AC current via the clamp, and AC/DC voltage, resistance and continuity via test leads
  • Detects the most common wiring problems in standard and GFCI receptacles including open ground, reverse polarity, open hot, open neutral and hot/ground reversed
  • Line splitter allows the measuring of current draw up to 15A without splitting the load’s power cord
  • CAT III 600V, Class 2, Double insulation safety rating
  • AC Auto-Ranging 400 amp digital clamp meter
  • Backlit display for clear readings
  • Includes a case, test leads and batteries

Read more

Electrical Tester Kit w/ clamp meter, GFCI tester, line splitter

Clamp Meter measures current, voltage, resistance and continuity

GFCI Outlet Tester with LED lights, indicates wiring problems

Read more
